params._counterpart: The address of `L1StandardERC20Gateway` contract in L1.
params._messenger: The address of `L2ScrollMessenger` contract in L2.
params._router: The address of `L2GatewayRouter` contract in L2.
params._tokenFactory: The address of `ScrollStandardERC20Factory` contract in L2.

finalizeDepositERC20(address,address,add.details: Make this function payable to handle WETH deposit/withdraw.      The function should only be called by L2ScrollMessenger.      The function should also only be called by L1ERC20Gateway in L1.

params.amount: The amount of the token to deposit.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.from: The address of account who deposits the token in L1.
params.l1Token: The address of corresponding L1 token.
params.l2Token: The address of corresponding L2 token.
params.to: The address of recipient in L2 to receive the token.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: The parameters `_counterpart`, `_router`, `_messenger` and `_tokenFactory` are no longer used.

params._counterpart: The address of `L1StandardERC20Gateway` contract in L1.
params._messenger: The address of `L2ScrollMessenger` contract in L2.
params._router: The address of `L2GatewayRouter` contract in L2.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawERC20(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L1.
params.token: The address of token in L2.

withdrawERC20(address,uint256,uint256).details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.token: The address of token in L2.

withdrawERC20AndCall(address,address,uin.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L1.
params.token: The address of token in L2.

counterpart().notice: The address of corresponding L1/L2 Gateway contract.

finalizeDepositERC20(address,address,add.notice: Complete a deposit from L1 to L2 and send fund to recipient's account in L2.

getL1ERC20Address(address).notice: Return the corresponding l1 token address given l2 token address.

getL2ERC20Address(address).notice: Return the corresponding l2 token address given l1 token address.

messenger().notice: The address of corresponding L1ScrollMessenger/L2ScrollMessenger contract.

withdrawERC20(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Withdraw of some token to a recipient's account on L1.

withdrawERC20(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw of some token to a caller's account on L1.

withdrawERC20AndCall(address,address,uin.notice: Withdraw of some token to a recipient's account on L1 and call.

documentation.text: @notice Mapping from l2 token address to l1 token address.
@dev The storage slot used as ScrollStandardERC20Factory contract, which is deprecated now.
